channel.title: iPod to mixer - problems with the output
channel.description:
Basically, I'm connecting my Ipod to my mixer via a RCA to 3.5mm cable. The problem is that when left as is, the sound from the left speaker is really dull and quiet, but when I play with the cable around the 3.5mm jack end, I will get an occassional fix and the sound will be fine. I first assumed that it would be the wire inside that could be the problem, but when I connected my iPod straight to my amp the sound was fine. Only problem is that I now have no control over the treble and bass without running it through an EQ first.
Any ideas what the problem could be? I'm gunna keep on messing around and hopefully I'll hit something. It was only a cheap cable so if you think it might be worth buying another one then I might as well.
cheers!!
My laptop will play fine through it, which I guess is enough seeing as all my music thats on my laptop is on my iPod.
It isn't just the iPod though because I have tried a Zen Creative on it which also has the same problem. I've also tried connecting the cable through a 3.5mm to a 3.5 female and gives me the same problem. I can't help but think that it's a problem with the jack rather than the wire.
**hahaha, ok...I had to bend the jack ever so slightly and now it'splaying fine. I guess there wasn't the greated connection between between the two....cheap piece of crap.

item.title: iPod to mixer - problems with the output
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think the problem is you must be holding your iPod wrong! (Sorry about that, it was obligatory :P)

Anyway, yea when you can play around with the cable and make it change it’s just a bad connection, it could be the cable or either end. If you can do what you did and eliminate both of the ends as a problem then it’s definitely the cable.

Read full topic
item.source: iPod to mixer - problems with the output

item.title: iPod to mixer - problems with the output
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Does your Laptop work with the mixer using the RCA to 3.5?

I have about the same issue with my Ipod, but the problem is related to the Ipod 3.5mm output (have the same issue using different headphones).

Read full topic
